alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 07 at 4:58AM PDT until May 09 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts to between 45 and 55 mph. * WHERE...Antelope Valley. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 10 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Areas of blowing dust can suddenly and dangerously reduce visibilities to near zero. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds and blowing dust include Highways 14 and 138, especially near the foothills. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
